page.title: 15Farming
page.content: In our area the main type of farming is dairy farming.After going to the farms and questioning the owners we found this out.Sheep farming is the next most common. The reasons for it mainly being daily farming is because the farms are small and havn't got so much land which limits the farmer to what type of farming he can do,another reason is that if they produced beef there would not be enough profit made on them. Most farms are built on hillsides and so if they did produce beef cattle the meat would be worked off on the cow because of all the walking up and down the fields they would be doing.The fields therefore ared for grazing the cattle in,and in the summer the farmers mow the fields and use it for silage,hay or straw using different methods to produce each or either one.
